text:
@realDonaldTrump The stupidity of this is only exceeded by the stupidity of curing COVID with bleach.

You force our Governors to fend for themselves and when they do you take their Ventilators and give them away so you can pretend the worst is behind us.

America first?
https://t.co/FVfGDDXM6l
